name: LineageOS
changelog:
• Updated to May ASB.
  • Updated NoName kernel to 4.14.344.
  • Updated system emojis.
  • Improved system smoothness.
  • Fixed microphone issue for some users.
  • Added the ability to show the WiFi standard.
  • Added the ability to always show the Bluetooth icon when enabled.
  • Added face unlock.
notes:
• Removal of the stock camera may be temporary; it could be reintroduced in the future.
  • Skyblueborb is also maintaining LineageOS 21 and 22
